subject: Re: Gavin Joseph
body:
We have discussed project financing, soft loans before, now I have a way
out.

I have a wealthy family that underwrites our company before, now they
approached me to assist them for investment of $2.5Billion on a lucrative
business that will yield dividends ,but I donâ€™t have the capacity to
assimilate this fund for safekeeping and investment so I thought of you,
you can help us in investing this fund and safe keep for investment on any
business of yours, the family are wealthy politicians who have made a lot
of money, they are willing to give us 30% and 70% for them on return
investment, I am proposing that if you have a capable hands that can handle
this fund, I will share 25% for you and 5% for me.



This means you can now have soft loan, project financing without any
collateral or interest on the loan, instead our funder will be the one
paying us for investment and fund safe keeping.



Please reply for more details so we can sign NCNDA.
Regards

Gavin Joseph
